document_data.name: Jornos Hawkwinter
document_data.mainbody: '''Jornos Hawkwinter''' was a member of [[House Hawkwinter]] of [[Waterdeep]] and the twin brother of Countess [[Kyrin Hawkwinter]] of [[Tethyr]]. He had a son named [[Geiron Hawkwinter]], who also served the royal court of Tethyr.
